title: [Digital Tutors] Quick Start to Animation in MODO (Vol.2)-KTR
description:
[Digital Tutors] Quick Start to Animation in MODO (Vol.2)-KTR
=============================================================


PUBLISHER....:  Digital Tutors         
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
LEVEL.........: INTERMEDIATE
RUNTIME......:  47m 18s
SOFTWARE.....:  MODO 801


About this course::

Welcome to Volume 2 of the Quick Start to Animation in MODO, a series of specially constructed tutorials meant to be followed in sequence and interspersed with valuable exercises to reinforce learned concepts. 

In this Volume, we'll build on the concepts covered in Volume 1. We'll start by learning how to animate with constraints. We'll then learn about path animation, and to conclude the training, we'll delve deeper into the Graph Editor, learning more about the amazing tools it offers to help us bring our work to the next level. 

These tutorials are designed to be taken in sequence so we really encourage you to start with Volume 1 before continuing with this section. We also encourage you to take advantage of the assignments that follow each Volume. These assignments will allow you to take what you've learned and apply those tools and techniques to your own projects. 



Topics include:

1.Introduction and project overview

2.Intuitively scrubbing in MODO with the Time tool

3.Animating with constraints in MODO

4.The Channel Haul

5.Animating a jump

6.Polishing the jump and working with Shadow function

7.Finalizing the animation

8.Volume 2 assignment
